PHRASE.LANG: Up-Chuck is one wild and crazy guy and the life of every party! Up-Chuck is your best party Companion Peep! He will follow you throughout PS Home and will be your best buddy. [#Legal]
Up-Chuck est un gars fou-furieux et une boule-en-train! Up-Chuck est ton meilleur Peep de la soirée! Il te suivra partout et sera ton meilleur pote.[#Legal]
Up-Chuck ist ein wilder und verrückter Typ und eine echte Stimmungskanone! Up-Chuck ist dein bester Partyfreund. Er wird dir zu Hause überall hin folgen und ist dein bester Freund.[#Legal]
Up-Chuck é un tipo pazzo e scatenato, ed é l'anima della festa! Up-Chuck é il migliore Companion Peep per le feste. Ti seguirá in casa e diventerá il tuo migliore amico.[#Legal]
Up-Chuck es un tipo loco y es el alma de la fiesta! Up-Chuck es el mejor Companion Peep para las fiestas! Te seguirá a tu casa y se convertirá en tu mejor cuate.[#Legal]
Up-Chuck은 거칠고 성깔 있는 친구로 모든 파티 분위기를 업시켜 준답니다! Up-Chuck은 당신의 파티를 위한 최고의 컴패니언 Peep입니다! 온 집안을 졸졸 따라다니며 당신의 가장 친한 친구가 되고 싶어합니다. [#Legal]
Up-Chuck is one wild and crazy guy and the life of every party! Up-Chuck is your best party Companion Peep! He will follow you throughout PS Home and will be your best buddy. [#Legal]
Up-Chuck野性瘋狂，是派對的靈魂人物！Up-Chuck是您最好的隨身夥伴Peep！他會在PS Home伴您左右，成為您的好朋友。 [#Legal]
Up-Chuck野性瘋狂，是派對的靈魂人物！Up-Chuck是您最好的隨身夥伴Peep！他會在PS Home伴您左右，成為您的好朋友。 [#Legal]
Up-Chuck is one wild and crazy guy and the life of every party! Up-Chuck is your best party Companion Peep! He will follow you throughout Home and will be your best buddy.[#Legal]
